author: wddgit
body:
#### PR description:

Disable the getFedFromOmds configuration option in L1RCTProducer.

The code change will cause an exception to be thrown if the getFedFromOmds
configuration option is set true. In the code in the CMSSW repository, this parameter
is set true in only one standalone configuration which we believe to be no longer used.

We considered deleting the code related to this option, but there seemed to be some
very small doubt about whether this code was used or not so we decided an exception
throw with a descriptive message would be a safer option than simply deleting it.

Possibly someday in the future, this part of the code can be deleted and cleaned up if
no problems are reported.

See Issue #43697 for more details.

#### PR validation:

Relies on existing tests. The only possible change in behavior is an exception throw.
title: Disable the getFedFromOmds configuration option in L1RCTProducer
